messages.title: You can use your local vote to get on with the priorities we all share.
messages.content: A majority government can build on our progress and invest in the priorities we all share. Because a majority government can finally get Brexit out of the way.

messages.title: We can’t afford to go back to square one. But that’s exactly where another hung parliament would take us. So your local vote has never been more important.
messages.content: Don't risk five long years of Jeremy Corbyn. Use your vote to vote for the Conservative to secure a majority government.

messages.title: On the 12th of December, you’ll cast your vote. So the next five years are now down to you and your local vote in Cambridge.
messages.content: It's easy to forget, but in 2010 the country looked very different. Public finances in chaos. Out-of-control spending. More and more people unemployed.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit done with a deal that protects jobs and trade.
Invest in our NHS – Investing in a state of the art hospital at Addenbrookes.
Increasing funding for Cambridge Schools – More pupil funding including £780m in SEND provision.
Building a better Cambridge – Investing in the A428 upgrade and the south Cambridge railway station and opposing the introduction of a City Congestion Charge.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the last election, the Conservatives were only nine seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close – and Cambridge is one of the seats Boris Johnson needs to win; so, will you use your vote to secure a majority government?

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit done with a deal that protects jobs and trade.
issues.education: More pupil funding including £780m in SEND provision.
issues.health: Investing in a state of the art hospital at Addenbrookes.

housing.content: Invest in our NHS – Investing in a state of the art hospital at Addenbrookes.
